latex input:	mmd-article-header  
Title:	MultiMarkdown Superscript Test  
latex mode:	memoir  
Base Header Level:	2  
latex input:	mmd-article-begin-doc  
latex footer:	mmd-memoir-footer  

# Superscript #

x^2.

x^2.^


# Subscripts #

x~z.

z~z.~

# Neither #

~/Library/MultiMarkdown

^test

x\^y
x\~y
